name: Slow Cooker Mac and Cheese
author: Cathy P
summary: This creamy, comforting meal takes just moments to assemble and is always a big hit. Great for large family gatherings and to take to pot luck dinners. I'm always asked for the recipe!
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 (16 ounce) package shredded Cheddar cheese, divided
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed Cheddar cheese soup (such as Campbell's®)
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook elbow macaroni in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, 8 minutes
Drain and transfer pasta to slow cooker
Add butter to pasta and stir until melted; season with salt and pepper
Sprinkle about 1/2 the Cheddar cheese over pasta and stir
Whisk evaporated milk and eggs together in a bowl until smooth; stir into pasta mixture
Whisk milk and Cheddar cheese soup together in a bowl until smooth; stir into pasta mixture
Sprinkle remaining cheese over pasta mixture; garnish with paprika
